commitments.commitment: Expanding findings document in next 8 to 10 weeks to create one place for all Ergo wallet information
commitments.quote: we will be... We're going to be expanding our findings in the next 8 to 10 weeks, we're just going to try to make it essentially one place where you can go where you can find all the information that you need

commitments.commitment: Creating similar projects for every ErgoHack
commitments.quote: I think I'll do something like this for every ErgoHack

open_questions.question: Whether NFT image loading issues are related to IPFS
open_questions.context: Users reporting that NFT pictures don't always load in wallets

key_facts.fact: Survey covered six wallets: Nautilus, SafeW, Minotaur, Satergo, Ergo Mobile, and Paper Wallet
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow

key_facts.fact: Nautilus wallet and Ergo Mobile wallet are the top-rated and most widely used wallets
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow

key_facts.fact: Most survey respondents said they haven't encountered wallet bugs or issues
key_facts.speaker: ErgoMinnow
